title: System Design Level 5 — CAP & Consistency Patterns
intro: This level introduces CAP theorem and some consistency patterns.
points: Know CAP theorem: Consistency, Availability, Partition tolerance.
Understand that in presence of network partitions you trade off C vs A.
Learn basic patterns: read replicas, leader–follower, quorum reads/writes (concept).
Understand eventual consistency at user level (stale reads).
Realize that many real systems are AP or CP depending on use-case.
